content: One key tip, however, is to start the fight right when the alarm ends in the Pagoda Realm, which halves your health. That way, you can get through most, if not all, of the fight without losing a huge chunk of your survivability.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'The_Spirit_of_Captain_Lotus-Vision.md', within the main section titled 'The Spirit of Captain Lotus-Vision'.
The content is as follows:
One key tip, however, is to start the fight right when the alarm ends in the Pagoda Realm, which halves your health. That way, you can get through most, if not all, of the fight without losing a huge chunk of your survivability.
